answers.answer: Hi,Itching in the anus could be due to the following reasons.It could be due to anal fissure, hemorrhoids, infection, fecal incontinence, prolapse of rectum, pinworms, contact dermatitis, diabetes, certain diet including coffee,cola, chocalate, milk, beer and certain medications.It has been said that dietary factors especially any form of coffee may be the most common culprit.And finally in a certain percentage of pateints no cause can be found out.Treating the underlying cause is advised.You should stop 'polishing' the anus thinking it is unclean (which causes it to itch).Wiping gently with wet tisue may be done.Other treatment options include high fiber diet, plenty of fluids , 1% hydrocortisone cream.
